info.name: genealogy (mono-parent)
info.description:
Ancestors are represented by random colors on top.
Each line is a new generation.
A child inherit from the id of his parent, randomly chosen in the neighborhood of size L at the previous generation. 
This illustrate how gene pool weakens (if no mutations)
